author: Universal Pictures
description:
Ethel (Katharine Hepburn) reassures Norman (Henry Fonda) with the heartfelt words, "You're my knight in shining armor." 

Buy/Rent On Golden Pond!
Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/Golden-Pond-Henry-Fonda/dp/B0787FSFTX
Prime Video: https://www.primevideo.com/detail/On-Golden-Pond/0QX0P4YE4X38PO93LUTVDFXQ28
Apple TV: https://tv.apple.com/ca/movie/on-golden-pond/umc.cmc.4y0gs8w0djcb12cax2wrdiodz
YouTube Movies: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PYn-RCQAz5s

Curmudgeon Norman is estranged from his daughter Chelsea. Nevertheless, at Golden Pond he and his wife agree to look after Billy, the son of Chelsea's new boyfriend, and a most unexpected relationship blooms.

Cast: Katherine Hepburn, Henry Fonda, Jane Fonda 
Produced by: Bruce Gilbert
Directed by: Mark Rydell
title: On Golden Pond | Katharine Hepburn & Henry Fonda’s Beautiful Moment
